page.title: 15Recreation in Pontycymer
page.content: There are several recreational activities available to young people. The Garw Valley leisure centre has made the greatest contribution in recent times but previous to this, other organisations provided facilities and will continue to do so. At the centre, gymnastics, popmobility, disco, dancing and seasonal sport are prominent. The Ffaldau Primary School helps young people by organising rugby, basketball, netball and hockey matches. In Pontycymer both rugby and soccer pitchesare frequentlyin use and there is inadequate provision of tennis courts to meetthe demand of tennis club members (35p per hour) The nearest swiming pool is at Llangeinor, three miles down the valley.
